error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'proposal_hours' (value: 2) was used instead of 'hours_spent_so_far' (value: 12).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 18
So far, Jenny has spent 10+2=<<10+2=12>>12 hours on the project.
Thus, she has 20-2=<<20-2=18>>18 hours to write her report.
